trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement Troubleshooting Guide - APIs
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement Troubleshooting Guide - APIs

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting Guides for Azure Mobile Engagement - APIs
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting Guides for Azure Mobile Engagement - APIs

trans-unit.source: The following are possible issues you may encounter with how administrators interact with Azure Mobile Engagement via the APIs.
trans-unit.target: The following are possible issues you may encounter with how administrators interact with Azure Mobile Engagement via the APIs.

trans-unit.source: Syntax Errors using the API (or unexpected behavior).
trans-unit.target: Syntax Errors using the API (or unexpected behavior).

trans-unit.source: Make sure to check the Syntax of the specific API you are using to confirm that the option is available.
trans-unit.target: Make sure to check the Syntax of the specific API you are using to confirm that the option is available.

trans-unit.source: A common issue with API usage is to confuse the Reach API and the Push API (most tasks should be performed with the Reach API instead of the Push API).
trans-unit.target: A common issue with API usage is to confuse the Reach API and the Push API (most tasks should be performed with the Reach API instead of the Push API).

trans-unit.source: Another common issue with SDK integration and API usage is to confuse the SDK Key and the API Key.
trans-unit.target: Another common issue with SDK integration and API usage is to confuse the SDK Key and the API Key.

trans-unit.source: Scripts that connect to the APIs need to send data at least every 10 minutes or the connection will time out (especially common in Monitor API scripts listening for data).
trans-unit.target: Scripts that connect to the APIs need to send data at least every 10 minutes or the connection will time out (especially common in Monitor API scripts listening for data).

trans-unit.source: To prevent timeouts, have your script send an XMPP ping every 10 minutes to keep the session alive with the server.
trans-unit.target: To prevent timeouts, have your script send an XMPP ping every 10 minutes to keep the session alive with the server.

trans-unit.source: Unable to use the API to perform the same action available in the Azure Mobile Engagement UI
trans-unit.target: Unable to use the API to perform the same action available in the Azure Mobile Engagement UI

trans-unit.source: An action that works from the Azure Mobile Engagement UI doesn't work from the related Azure Mobile Engagement API.
trans-unit.target: An action that works from the Azure Mobile Engagement UI doesn't work from the related Azure Mobile Engagement API.

trans-unit.source: Confirming that you can perform the same action from the Azure Mobile Engagement UI shows that you have correctly integrated this feature of Azure Mobile Engagement with the SDK.
trans-unit.target: Confirming that you can perform the same action from the Azure Mobile Engagement UI shows that you have correctly integrated this feature of Azure Mobile Engagement with the SDK.

trans-unit.source: Error codes using the API displayed at runtime or in logs.
trans-unit.target: Error codes using the API displayed at runtime or in logs.

trans-unit.source: Here is a composite list of common API status codes numbers for reference and preliminary troubleshooting:
trans-unit.target: Here is a composite list of common API status codes numbers for reference and preliminary troubleshooting:

trans-unit.source: [API Documentation - for detailed errors on each specific API][Link 4]
trans-unit.target: [API Documentation - for detailed errors on each specific API][Link 4]

trans-unit.source: API action fails with no error message displayed at runtime or in logs.
trans-unit.target: API action fails with no error message displayed at runtime or in logs.

trans-unit.source: Many items will be disabled in the Azure Mobile Engagement UI if they aren't integrated correctly, but will fail silently from the API, so remember to test the same functionality from the UI to see if it works.
trans-unit.target: Many items will be disabled in the Azure Mobile Engagement UI if they aren't integrated correctly, but will fail silently from the API, so remember to test the same functionality from the UI to see if it works.

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Engagement, and many advanced features of Azure Mobile Engagement you are attempting to use, need to be individually integrated into your app with the SDK as separate steps before you can use them.
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Engagement, and many advanced features of Azure Mobile Engagement you are attempting to use, need to be individually integrated into your app with the SDK as separate steps before you can use them.
